participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, Emily enjoys engaging with others and sharing her love for learning.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i am an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers. i love to play board games.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Resilient and determined, Michael has a strong sense of duty and enjoys team sports.
participant_2.background: i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i love playing softball.
